name: job-application-service
description: Production-ready HTTP service for job applications with auto-scoring

scripts.db:docker: docker run -d --name job_app_postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=job_application_service -p 5432:5432 postgres:15-alpine && echo '⏳ Waiting for PostgreSQL to start...' && sleep 5 && echo '✅ PostgreSQL is ready!'
scripts.db:docker:stop: docker stop job_app_postgres && docker rm job_app_postgres
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:clean && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:setup && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
